page.title: 07PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: The pub is over 100 years old.It was a beer house until 1965 after which spirits were introduced.It has a mixed clientele-all week.There is no seperate dining area but a comprehensive bar menu is kept. The busiest days are Friday and Saturday.There are three staff working behind the bar per session and a cleaner is employed each day.The daily opening times are 11am to 2.30pm and 6pm to 11pm.Sundays are different.Music is played most times as background music(cassettes) The most popular drink is bitter and the most expensive a bottle of Grolsch lager at Â£1.36. The following games are played in the pub:dominoes,crib,darts,shove h'penny and petanque.
